snippet: Shares of several beer makers were higher after Anheuser-Busch InBev said it had finalized the terms of a takeover of SABMiller.
abstract: Stocks fall due to weak sales report from Macy's that investors take as warning about larger retail industry.
lead_paragraph: Shares of several beer makers were higher after Anheuser-Busch InBev said it had finalized the terms of a takeover of SABMiller.

headline.main: Market Ticks Downward as Retail and Energy Shares Drop
headline.print_headline: Fears of Shopping Slump Rattle Market
